General.Name: Jinke Property Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinke Property Group Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate development business in China. The company was formerly known as Chongqing Dongyuan Industrial Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jinke Property Group Co., Ltd. in June 2011. Jinke Property Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Chongqing, China.
